channel.title: System cannot find the path specified?
channel.description:
Okay when I try to compile it pops up and I get this message:
System cannot find the path specified Press any key to continue . . .
Im stuck.... Yes I downloaded java but there are a bunch of the different kinds x.x Can someone give me a link to the java that I need? If that isnt the problem then I don't know. Dont ask for my compiler code or something because in all honesty I will have no idea what you are talking about :L I just downloaded a source and this is my first server im trying to get up.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 22, 2009, 03:24:16 pm[/size][hr]Well if you MUST have the code I can put it on here x.X I suppose it wouldn't kill me.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 22, 2009, 03:28:36 pm[/size][hr]If you go to the compiler and click edit this is the code you get: HELP?
@echo off COLOR 09 title Homiescape v1 echo ------------------------- echo Cmon.. Compile.. Cmon.. echo ------------------------- "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_17\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause cls COLOR 06 echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ echo W00T DONE echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

item.title: System cannot find the path specified?
item.dc:creator: @i_nelson_i i nelson i
item.description:
@i_nelson_i wrote:

follow

my computer > c drive > program files > java >

right click the jdk folder and click rename, then copy the name and close that

now right click ur compiler edit it replace with this

@echo off
Title Compiler
"C:\Program Files\Java\paste here\bin\javac.exe" *.java
pause

where it says paste here, paste the name of ur jdk to there

should say sommet like this

@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

Read full topic
item.source: System cannot find the path specified?

item.title: System cannot find the path specified?
item.dc:creator: @jake_93 jake_93
item.description:
@jake_93 wrote:

Sokid, Go to your programme files and check the path to your java then right click on your compiler then edit, and make sure the path mathes the patch to your java and it should work fine.

If not then here is the link to some more Java Downloads: http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp

Hope i helped,
Jake

Read full topic
item.source: System cannot find the path specified?

item.title: System cannot find the path specified?
item.dc:creator: @tennisbro tennisbro
item.description:
@tennisbro wrote:

Cmon… Compile… Cmon…

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: */java
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: *.java
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source)

thats what i got when i did that

Read full topic

item.title: System cannot find the path specified?
item.dc:creator: @Sokid Sokid
item.description:
@Sokid wrote:

Okay when I try to compile it pops up and I get this message:

System cannot find the path specified
Press any key to continue . . .

Im stuck… Yes I downloaded java but there are a bunch of the different kinds x.x Can someone give me a link to the java that I need? If that isnt the problem then I don’t know. Dont ask for my compiler code or something because in all honesty I will have no idea what you are talking about :L I just downloaded a source and this is my first server im trying to get up.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 22, 2009, 03:24:16 pm[/size][hr]Well if you MUST have the code I can put it on here x.X I suppose it wouldn’t kill me.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 22, 2009, 03:28:36 pm[/size][hr]If you go to the compiler and click edit this is the code you get:
HELP?

@echo off
COLOR 09
title Homiescape v1
echo -------------------------
echo Cmon… Compile… Cmon…
echo -------------------------
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_17\bin\javac.exe” *.java
pause
cls
COLOR 06
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
echo W00T DONE
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
